summary: App with image gallery, bird data, map, and control buttons. User wants the image gallery edit functionality fixed: after adding a bird, the gallery and edit options don't appear. Need to enable image/sound upload in the edit feature without changing anything else in the app.
known_issues: Image gallery does not display after adding a bird; edit option also missing in gallery

existing_features.title: After a new bird is added, the BirdGallery component must immediately display the newly added bird's card without requiring a full page reload. Ensure the React Query cache for the gallery list is invalidated (or refetched) upon successful bird creation so the new entry appears in the gallery grid.

The edit button/option in BirdGallery must be visible and functional for each bird card. Currently the edit option does not appear. Ensure the edit dialog is rendered and the edit trigger (button/icon) is shown correctly for each card, respecting existing admin-check logic without altering it.

In the BirdGallery edit dialog, add file upload inputs that allow replacing the bird's image and/or audio file. The upload should store the new blob to the backend and update the bird record. This change must be scoped only to the edit dialog inside BirdGallery and must not affect any other part of the application.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix image gallery: after adding a bird, the gallery doesn't show and the edit option doesn't appear; enable image/sound upload in edit without changing other parts of the app
